thread.title: This Alias Star Is Checking Into Chicago Med for a Heartbreaking Role
thread.title_full: This Alias Star Is Checking Into Chicago Med for a Heartbreaking Role

author: TV Guide
title: This Alias Star Is Checking Into Chicago Med for a Heartbreaking Role
text: This Alias Star Is Checking Into Chicago Med for a Heartbreaking Role One of SD-6's members is moving to Chicago.Alias star ... Comment The   TV Guide Posted Oct. 8, 2015 at 8:05 AM By TV Guide Posted Oct. 8, 2015 at 8:05 AM One of SD-6's members is moving to Chicago. Alias star Carl Lumbly has signed on for a recurring role on Chicago Med , as the husband of S. Epatha Merkerson 's character, TVLine reports. Merkerson plays Sharon Goodwin, the head of Gaffney Chicago Medical Center, and Lumbly will play Bert, a once vibrant man who suffers a sudden physical ailment that affects both his relationship with his wife and the hospital she leads. Lumbly recently appeared on Zoo and The Returned . Chicago Med premieres on Tuesday, Nov. 17 at 9/8c on NBC. Other Links From TVGuide.com
